Factsheet

Developer:
6Toad Games Cooperative
Based in Barcelona
Release date:
19th May, 2022
Platforms:
Windows
Regular Price:
USD 3,99

Request a press copy at contact@6toad.com

Description

In this cosmic puzzle adventure, help a lost tribe of duck-people in their millennial quest for a stable world!

History

Space Ducks: The great escape

Complete challenging Sokoban-like puzzles, by moving the space ducks in the right sequence, in order to reach the power source their ship requires and travel to the next level. But tread lightly, as walking on loose ground will propel into space what ever is standing on the other side. One duck's progress could mean another duck's demise! And even if a duck goes solo (years of living on precarious planets have turned the ducks into a somewhat callous people), remember that their is no escaping gravity and that one false move could bring it's mission to a crashing conclusion.

Cosmos9 puzzle games bundle

Space Ducks was launched as part of Cosmos9 Bundle: bundle of 9 puzzle games which were discovered in a mysterious, perhaps alien, video game console found floating outside of the Solar System. More info at https://www.cosmos9bundle.com/

Features

  • Help a lost tribe of duck-people escape from 18+ puzzle planets!
  • Learn and master original sokoban inspired mechanics
  • Harness gravity to reshape the planets to your needs
  • Coordinate the ducks' efforts (or let them die trying)
  • Enjoy the retro-classical art, dark humor and original music

Additional Links

Space Ducks was launched as part of Cosmos9 Bundle
CosmOS 9 is a bundle of 9 puzzle games which were discovered in a mysterious, perhaps alien, video game console found floating outside of the Solar System. The games were refined and ported to modern computers by a group of experienced puzzle game developers. cosmos9bundle.com.
